title: Did an undelivered speech from the state of John Kennedy say that "our duty as a party is not only for our party " but for "all mankind "?
subtitle: The words of President John Kennedy that the world has never heard.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A passage from a speech that John Kennedy was supposed to deliver the day he was murdered said that "our duty as a party is not only for our party, but for the nation, but for all humanity."
